attributes.action: Ensure that no person on benefits receives more than a person on minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taking all benefits, allowances, free school meals, reduction in council tax etc. into account, no such person or family should be better off financially than a person on minimum (net) wage, i.e. after paying tax, national insurance and possibly cost of travel to work.
